title: Chapter 1990 - Chapter 1990: Chapter 1990-Individual Training
body:
Chapter 1990 - Chapter 1990: Chapter 1990-Individual Training

Chapter 1990: Chapter 1990-individual training

Translator: 549690339

alright, but it’s best if there are two or more of them. At least they can take care of each other!

Lu Ming said.

Everyone nodded their heads. Following that, Luo Tianyi and Huang Li led the other elites of the desolate race and charged into the distance.

Long Chen, Huang Ling, and Luo Xiang formed a group and ran into the distance.

bubble, you’ll support from the middle. If any side encounters any danger that they can’t handle, rescue them in time!

Lu Ming said to Pao Pao.

“Alright, brother Lu Ming, chirp chirp!”

Bubbles nodded, and her petite figure disappeared without a trace.

Lu Ming, on the other hand, led Lu Xiangxiang in a direction.

Bang!

Not long after, an Emperor-to-be three-eyed God was punched to death by Lu Ming. He kept the God’s third eye and a black bangle.

This bracelet was used by the three-eyed God race to store items, and its function was similar to storage rings.

“Xiangxiang, I’ll leave these two to you!”

Lu Ming’s figure flashed and he left the two lower-tier absolute Saints to Xiangxiang Bella. He would deal with the rest.

The battlefield was the best place to temper himself. He was thinking that when Ouyang Moll’s cultivation was higher, he would also bring him out to temper himself.

Xiangxiang Bella fought two three-eyed God race absolute Saints at the lower-tier absolute Saint realm alone, and the battle was extremely intense.

Not long after, Xiangxiang Bella successfully killed the two three-eyed God race members.

Lu Ming nodded his head in satisfaction. Then, he gave Xiangxiang Beila a three-eyed God who was a late-stage absolute Saint.

The three-eyed God instantly gave Xiangxiang Xiang a fatal pressure.

Pfft!

Xiangxiang Bella’s shoulder was hit by the other party’s destructive light, and a hole appeared.

However, Lu Ming had no intention of helping.

He had experienced too many life-and-death battles in his life. He knew very well that if he didn’t experience any life-and-death battles, he would just be a flower in a greenhouse. It was useless no matter how strong his talent was.

“Master!”

Xiangxiang Beila called out delicately, her small face pale.

solve it yourself. As the child of life, do you have to always rely on others?”

Lu Ming said with a cold expression. He killed an absolute Saint in the great circle with one punch.

Xiangxiang Beila gritted her teeth. Her entire body was covered in green light as she circulated her life laws. Her injuries from before were instantly healed.

The body of life and the law of life contained endless vitality. It was many times stronger than Huang Ling’s law of imperishable flame and had vigorous vitality.

At the same time, countless vines appeared, like long whips, sweeping towards the other party.

But without a doubt, Xiangxiang Beila was at a disadvantage.

She was talented, but she didn’t have much combat experience, so she couldn’t use all her power.

However, during the battle, Xiangxiang Beila seemed to have found the feeling and was already able to slowly protect herself.

“En!”

Lu Ming nodded. He then hunted alone in the surrounding area.

Xiangxiang Beila had been fighting with the other party for a few hundred moves and had been injured many times. Under the life law, she had recovered very quickly.

“What monster?”

The more the three-eyed God fought, the more frightened he became.

The other party was completely unkillable, and his own injuries were getting worse and worse.

After a few hundred moves, Xiangxiang Beila finally exhausted her opponent to death and then killed her.

Xiangxiang Beila was also heavily injured. However, under the life laws, she was rapidly recovering.

“Master, I’ve succeeded!”

Xiangxiang Beila came to Lu Ming’s side. Her eyes were much more determined and sharp than before.

“Hmm, not bad, continue!”

let’s go,” Lu Ming said. Then, he gave Xiangxiang Beila another three-eyed God who was an absolute Saint in the late stages.

Xiangxiang Bella’s talent was indeed unparalleled. In a life-and-death battle, she had improved at an astonishing speed. Her display of combat power, her use of the power law, her battle consciousness, and her battle mentality had all undergone a huge change.

This time, within a hundred moves, Xiangxiang Beila finished off her opponent. Although she was also severely injured, with her Constitution, she was not afraid of being injured.

Lu Ming nodded and brought Xiangxiang Beila to continue hunting the three-eyed God race.

As for Huang Ling, Long Chen, and desolate li, they were all going through a tough battle.

Their opponents were naturally Emperor-to-be level.

Huang Ling, Long Chen, and Huang Li were all at the peak of the absolute Saint realm. They had the power to fight an Emperor-to-be, but it would be difficult.

Luo Tianyi’s cultivation level was higher, so she was still in a better position, but she was also in a tough battle.

Everyone was engaged in a life-or-death battle in order to break through their limits and achieve a great leap.

Whoosh!

All of a sudden, a destructive light shot toward Lu Ming.

The destructive light cut through the void silently, but Lu Ming’s hair stood on end as he felt a fatal threat.

Without hesitation, Lu Ming pointed in that direction. The power of the chaotic finger of tribulation gathered in his finger and collided with the destructive light.

boom!

Lu Ming felt a surge of terrifying power surging towards him. He could not help but take a few steps back and his fingers were numb.

“What powerful strength!”

Lu Ming narrowed his eyes and looked ahead.

&Nbsp; a five-meter tall three-eyed God riding a strange beast was approaching, his body exuding a terrifying aura.

This three-eyed God wasn’t a great emperor, but he was definitely powerful.

“Kid, I’ve been watching you for a few days. You’ve killed many of our men. Today is the day you die. Kill!”

The burly three-eyed God roared and swung his battle axe. The mutant beast roared and charged toward Lu Ming.

Roar!

The strange beast roared and spat out a jet-black ray of light from its mouth. It charged at Lu Ming.

At the same time, the three-eyed God’s battle-ax tore through the air and slashed down at Lu Ming. The massive ax seemed to be able to split the sky apart, and its power was terrifying.

Holy weapons floated around Lu Ming.

There were only 37 of them.

Back in the world of the lotus flower, during the battle with the Emperor-to-be, most of the Saint weapons he had sealed in his meridians had been destroyed. Only a dozen or so absolute Saint weapons were left.

During this period of time, Lu Ming had re-cultivated the ten thousand soldiers art.

This time, he didn’t seal the bright Saint weapons or great saint weapons, but all of them into Saint weapons.

There were a total of 36 of them, and the last one was a monarch weapon.

It was the monarch weapon he got from Luo pokong.

Although there were fewer of them than before, their power was many times stronger.

Lu Ming held the long spear and the other 36 absolute Saint weapons floated around him. The Qi of the combat weapon was integrated and blocked the attack of the beast.

At the same time, he lifted his spear and clashed with the battle-ax.

Clang!

&Nbsp; a terrifying shockwave exploded out, and the other party roared as he and the Beast he was riding were forced back a dozen steps.

As for Lu Ming, his body also retreated.

what a powerful combat strength! It’s equivalent to the king body of the Emperor-to-be realm!

Lu Ming had a thought in his mind and his eyes flashed with a strong fighting spirit.

His combat strength was equivalent to the Emperor-to-be King body. This was the strongest Emperor-to-be Lu Ming had ever encountered. Previously, the Emperor-to-be he had encountered could not put pressure on him.

However, this one was different. It had the ability to threaten Lu Ming’s life.

This was also the training that Lu Ming wanted. Otherwise, Lu Ming would not be able to train in the big battle..
